titleStmt.title: A dialoge or co[m]municacion bytwene the curate or ghostly father, & the parochiane or ghostly chyld, for a due preparacion vnto howselynge ; The werke for housholders w[ith] the golden pystle and alphabete or a crosrowe called an A.B.C.
titleStmt.author: Whitford, Richard, fl. 1495-1555?

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted by me John Waylande at London within Temple barre at the synge of the blewe garlande,

notesStmt.note: "A dayly exercyse and experyence of dethe" and "The werke for housholders" each has special t.p.
Dedication begins: "Unto the deuoute reders in our Lorde God & moste swete sauyour Jesu, Rychard Whytford your pore bedeman of Syon, salutacyon."
Signatures: A-K⁸ L⁸(L8+[x]1), ²A-E⁸ ²F⁴, *⁴ ³A-G⁸ ³H¹⁰.
Imperfect: faded, stained and torn, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: London within Temple barre at the synge of the blewe garlande
